mapper.select: select *from sys_Area a order by A_Level,A_ShowOrder
mapper.delete: delete from sys_Area where AreaId = #{param1} or A_ParentId = #{param1}
mapper.sql: AreaId, A_AreaNo, A_AreaCode, A_AreaName, A_ParentId, A_Level, A_LevelName, A_Zoning, A_ShowOrder
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_Area
A_AreaNo,
A_AreaCode,
A_AreaName,
A_ParentId,
A_Level,
A_LevelName,
A_Zoning,
A_ShowOrder,
#{aAreano,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_Area
A_AreaNo = #{aAreano,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A_AreaCode = #{aAreacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A_AreaName = #{aAreaname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
A_ParentId = #{aParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
A_Level = #{aLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
A_LevelName = #{aLevelname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
A_Zoning = #{aZoning,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
A_ShowOrder = #{aShoworder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where AreaId = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_Area set A_AreaNo = #{aAreano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A_AreaCode = #{aAreacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A_AreaName = #{aAreaname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, A_ParentId = #{aParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, A_Level = #{aLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, A_LevelName = #{aLevelname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, A_Zoning = #{aZoning,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, A_ShowOrder = #{aShoworder,jdbcType=INTEGER} where AreaId = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
